7efd81e6-3931-4d9d-bf88-16c80258b4ae: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} while in an act of passion with a willing mortal, Nocticula may grant a profane ascension. The target's name appears in glowing Abyssal runes on Nocticula's wings, and a crimson mark manifests somewhere on the target's body. The target immediately gains a +6 profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to any one {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} of its choice, a +4 profane bonus to any other ability score of its choice, and the Darkvision ability.
0b1db3a7-3d73-4828-b336-9c25918ad42d: Azata and her companions gain an ability that allows them to use any potion as a potion of a cure wounds {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} of the same level. This ability lasts 7 days.
bd42143c-61dd-44d3-902d-5e5bcc3caa9c: Azata gains an ability to summon a treant to fight on her side, similar to the {g|SpellsChangestaff}changestaff{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. The summoned treant has {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/-, natural armor 20, and has 18 {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g}.
69531380-b355-4bdc-aada-48bc8044bc71: Creature got a chance to prepare for the battle due to the alarm. It gets the effects of the {g|SpellsBlur}blur{/g} and {g|SpellsGreaterInvisibility}greater invisibility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} as if they were cast by 17th level wizard.
77b44d04-9a7b-4951-8afe-7b8e8484b385: Creature is ready for battle, gaining the effect of the {g|SpellsForesight}foresight{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
8e1a2b3a-0e8d-4008-bc80-697eded2e939: Creature was annoyed by the alarm. In this state it gets the effects of {g|SpellsHaste}haste{/g} and {g|SpellsRage}rage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} as if they were cast by a 17th level wizard.
d4a288a5-1bdd-4a5c-9601-3e3eb930f12a: Demonic augmented organs grant the wearer a +2 natural armor enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g}, +2 inherent bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made to overcome {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}Concentration checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attack{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Damage rolls{/g}, and all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. However, whenever your {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g} falls below 20%, you enter a frenzy and attack the nearest creature until you die or combat ends.
af81a750-eb10-4701-a7ea-719843d95426: For 7 days Azata and her companions get a +2 luck {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
a092b7ba-b3aa-4366-841e-ba7bbd08a830: For 7 days, Azata and her companions who had rested with her, gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
449013f2-d98a-4ee4-ba0f-94204f23f77d: For 7 days, whenever Azata or any companion who has rested with her is hit by an enemy, that enemy becomes dazzled for 1 minute.
ac2a3ac3-2202-406e-b3bf-78b094512ca1: For 7 days, whenever a companion enters the area of Azata's performance, they become invigorated. While under this effect, after a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} kills a living foe only of the following effect happens: If its wielder is {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g}, it removes the fatigue. If {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g}, the companion becomes fatigued instead. If neither exhausted nor fatigued, the companion gains a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on attack rolls and a +10 enhancement bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} until the end of the next turn.
00e7fa9b-ac07-47b8-9558-7b98d8e74dda: For 7 days, whenever a companion enters the area of Azata's performance, they become invigorated. While under this effect, after a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} kills a living foe, one of the following effects happens. If its wielder is {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g}, it removes the fatigue. If {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g}, the companion becomes fatigued instead. If neither exhausted nor fatigued, the companion gains a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on attack rolls and a +10 feet enhancement bonus to all modes of movement possessed until the end of the next turn.
51f800b8-e9e8-40bc-92f4-57b32bf123a0: For 7 days, whenever an enemy enters the area of Azata's mythical song performance, that enemy takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} and must succeed on a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} to avoid being {g|ConditionStunned}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
feff098b-0a65-48fd-9e04-1314efedbb25: For 7 days, while a companion is within the area of Azata's mythical song performance, they can stand up from being {g|ConditionProne}prone{/g} without provoking an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}. They gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} and a +2 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}.
8de02a69-6052-4fae-a5cb-b6d0835fdd04: Target suffers a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throws{/g}, becomes {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} and vulnerable to {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g}.
55fa4aee-44a8-46ee-815b-a9d44c5f34f1: The Sword of Valor creates an aura with a 10 mile radius that afflicts demons and demon worshipers with a â€“4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}.
93219315-c3e7-412a-9249-9e6962b9ef69: The fall has damaged your leg, making you limp. This effect can be removed by any {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
c88bdd30-e447-42e6-bd5c-5d57afd03242: The gates are screaming. All creatures in a 50-foot area must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 35) or suffer 170 {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} damage to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g}). Successful saving throw negates damage.
f99872c1-e2ea-46f5-9b18-07eac211d4ea: Vicinity of the Sword of Valor grants the Commander {g|Encyclopedia:Fast_Healing}Fast Healing{/g} equal to twice their mythic rank.
e4e4501e-59f5-44c5-bf33-c26d5d3fd24c: While under this effect, after a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} kills a living foe, one of the following effects happens. ac8a7d76-fb84-4385-98db-a1924431996c: You are ambushing the dragon, having prepared in advance and having no fear. You receive a +8 circumstance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}, and a +8 circumstance bonus on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against Fear effects.
89311f78-98f2-4e47-af62-020179824f6a:
You are imbued with mythic powers.
You get 2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, and a +5 mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to attack. All your attacks ignore enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g}, automatically confirm all {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g}, and deal additional 100% {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}divine damage{/g}. Every first attack you make during a round deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} divine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} in a line or cone depending on an attack type.
You get 100% fortification, DR 10/-, and 20 acid, fire, electricity, sonic and cold {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g}.
All your {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} ignore enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistances{/g} and energy resistance, enemies fail all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against them.
All healing and supporting spells additionally {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} and grant the target {g|Encyclopedia:Fast_Healing}Fast Healing{/g} 10 for 5 rounds.
All offensive spells deal additional 100% divine damage, make targets {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} and {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g}.
75c1a402-985d-43d8-8081-ce5289d6d003: You are permanently {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g}. This condition will go away after you take a {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}rest{/g}.
123b4eed-727d-4ec9-a2de-906dc2fd11f0: You are permanently {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g}. This wound will {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} after you take a {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}rest{/g}.
